member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING
member.summary: Specifies information about how an HTTP request or response should be represented in a message object.

member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING.requestMappingOptions
member.summary: Options that control how information in the HTTP request is mapped to the message object.

member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING.responseMappingOptions
member.summary: Options that control how information in the HTTP response is mapped to the message object.

member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING.requestHeaderMappings
member.summary: An array of pointers to mappings which describe which HTTP headers are mapped to/from headers in the message object for an HTTP request. The pointers in the array may not be NULL.

member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING.requestHeaderMappingCount
member.summary: The number of items in the requestHeaderMappings array.

member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING.responseHeaderMappings
member.summary: An array of pointers to mappings which describe which HTTP headers are mapped to/from headers in the message object for an HTTP response. The pointers in the array may not be NULL.

member.name: WS_HTTP_MESSAGE_MAPPING.responseHeaderMappingCount
member.summary: The number of items in the responseHeaderMappings array.
